out-content-type.description: String to use as the content type on outgoing serialized data

accept-content-types.description: A list of strings allowed as content types on incoming data to deserialize.

indicate-character-data.description: Whether the outgoing serialized data should have a payload format indicator that specifies character data.

allow-character-data.description: Whether to allow a payload format indicator that specifies character data for incoming data to deserialize.

fail-deserialization.description: Whether to fail the deserialization of incoming data.
